education.description: Hardware, software, and applications of super-resolution microscopy. See my thesis for more details!
As part of the IPES CDT, I took courses in advanced optics and photonics, and completed two research projects, graduating top of my class of 25

Two years studying core topics in all engineering disciplines, followed by two years specializing in optics and medical engineering. This culminated in a machine vision Masters project in Python, which kick-started my interest in software engineering.

work.title: Tutor, Teaching Assistant, and Academic Interviewer
work.description: I love passing my knowledge on to the next generation, and have been teaching various subjects since the age of 14. At Cambridge I found many opportunities to supervise undergraduate students, and was honored in my latter two years to interview Engineering applicants.
